attributes.action:
# I agree with Dawn. 
Make politicians accountable for their lies.
attributes.additional_details:
At present there appears to be no accountability for liars. This is now becoming so prevalent that is becoming acceptable.
This is setting a very bad example to the rest of the country. Plus our standing in the world is being tarnished.
attributes.background: Any politician who has lied to the house of commons needs to appear before the house and correct the lie.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create new body to oversee and sanction MPs for dishonesty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575036

Revoke rules against accusing MPs of deliberate falsehoods in House of Commons: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593112
